snippet: The private equity giant Kohlberg Kravis Roberts has agreed to buy a majority stake in the British oil and natural gas services company Acteon Group. The deal is valued at up to $1.4 billion, according to a person with direct knowledge of the matter.
abstract: The private equity giant Kohlberg Kravis Roberts has agreed to buy a majority stake in the British oil and natural gas services company Acteon Group. The deal is valued at up to $1.4 billion, according to a person with direct knowledge of the matter.

headline.main: K.K.R. to Buy Oil Services Firm Acteon Group
